fullText: Mold can start growing in as little as 48 to 72 hours in moist conditions. With summer humidity increasing, it's important to keep indoor levels below 45% to help prevent mold from taking hold. 🦠 https://t.co/EFyIr00zSL

fullText: Vol market has reset.  Term structure has steepened as $SPX daily straddle prices at Feb lows.  We may be in a spot up/vol up regime as people chase.  Grab some upside action.
